title: There's a troll in my rank (master tier) ....... riot ploz
body:
1. * > So I was sick of playing autofill in rank and stopped playing rank for a while, the first time i back they made a system where recent player have autofilled so i can get my roles and look what's happening. Other player have to dodge to actually have a fair team who can communicate without trolling. This guy believes he won't be banned for whatever reason and just going what ever he wants in rank srsly.. 

I have picture of him ssun, if u give me a email i will send it to u please ban him or something fml hate meeting players like this in rank badahj73@gmail.com

replies.body:
Hey there,

I'm having trouble understanding what you're trying to say here.

Do you mean a player is being unsportsmanlike in champion select? You have 2 options in this case.

* Play the game through and report the player in the post-game results screen.
* [Contact Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) and report the player there, please be sure to include any and all evidence you have regarding the incident.
